name: Prana Garvan Shirt - Men's
description:
A sun-protective shirt with venting for sunny days or tropical heat.Recycled polyester blend with a comfortable amount of stretch.Fabric dries quickly and wicks away moisture.UPF rated fabric stops more than 95% of harmful UV.Back vent has a mesh panel to help keep you cool.

        Sustainability
